# Content Blocklist - Prohibited IP Terms
# This file contains terms that trigger CI failures if found in game code or assets.
# Purpose: Prevent accidental use of copyrighted content from specific franchises.

# Backyard Baseball Characters (Humongous Entertainment)
Pablo Sanchez
Pete Wheeler
Achmed Khan
Keisha Phillips
Stephanie Morgan
Amir Khan
Kiesha Phillips
Angela Delvecchio
Kenny Kawaguchi
Dmitri Petrovich
Ernie Steele
Mikey Thomas
Sally Dobbs
Ronny Dobbs
Vicki Kawaguchi
Dante Robinson
Maria Luna
Jorge Garcia
Ashley Webber
Billy Jean Blackwood
Reese Worthington
Lisa Crockett
Tony Delvecchio
Annie Frazier
Luanne Lui
Stephanie Morgan

# Backyard Baseball Franchise Terms (context-specific)
# Note: Generic use of "backyard" is OK; only flag in game/character context
BackyardBaseball
Backyard Sports
Humongous Entertainment

# MLB Teams (when used as team names in game)
# Generic mentions in docs/comments are OK
# These are only flagged in asset files and game code
New York Yankees
Boston Red Sox
Los Angeles Dodgers
Chicago Cubs
San Francisco Giants

# Other Protected Terms
MLB The Show
R.B.I. Baseball
Super Mega Baseball
Out of the Park Baseball
# Add more as needed

# Notes:
# - This list is case-sensitive
# - Partial matches are flagged (e.g., "Pablo" in "Pablo_sprite.png")
# - Add new terms as threats are identified
# - Comments (lines starting with #) are ignored
